name: RetroPong GM
description:
Live the thrill again with this remake of the original Pong. This is the only remake around that resembles the original Pong Console. Outstanding music and Sound FX that will delight your ears. And an unparalleled AI will bring you hours of fun.
Challenge your friends, your family. Bring your grandma to play on the computer and show her who is the boss.

Controls:

Player 1:

  • W - up
  • S - down
  • D - power shot

Player 2:

  • UP - up
  • DOWN - down
  • LEFT - power shot
